description: The data transmitted with the event and relevant attributes for signing and encryption.

payload.description: The base64 representation of the first g-zipped and then encrypted original payload. For encryption, the AES-GCM algorithm with a 256-bit key, a 96-bit initialization vector (IV), and a 128-bit authentication tag must be used.

payloadSignature.description: Signature of the payload, to verify by whom the encrypted message has been created

description.description: Description of the purpose of the link

href.description: the- encrypted URL that should be called, to receive additional encrypted unstructured data, such as pdf, pictures, etc.

rel.description: The IG B2B Standard the links belongs to.

encryptionKey.description: The encrypted AES key, which was used to symmetrically encrypt the transmitted data. The key must be encrypted with the public key of the eventReceiver using RSA with PKCS#1 v1.5 padding.

publicKeyVersion.description: The version of the public key that was used to encrypt the encryptionKey.

signatureKeyVersion.description: The version of the signature key, that was used to sign the payload.
